text: He muminagana! Tomadera madhye ke'u dina theke phire gele niscaya'i allaha emana eka sampradaya [1] anabena yaderake tini bhalobasabena ebam yara tamke bhalobasabe; tara muminadera prati komala o kapheradera prati kathora habe; tara allahara pathe jihada karabe ebam kono nindukera nindara bhaya karabe na [2]; eta allahara anugraha, yake icche take tini ta dana karena ebam allaha pracuryamaya, sarbajna
